title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, steel
Technique: beaded crochet
description: Crocheted dark green silk ornamented with cut steel beads in diamond and dot patterns.  Two steel rings control side closing; steel bead tassels at either end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, steel
Technique: beaded crochet. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-27.
